cards.title: Titan
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may use a power now.
One player may play a card now.
Increase the next damage dealt by a hero target by 1.

openingLines.default: Wait until you see my other face.
openingLines.Cauldron.MythosCharacter: Hey, don't play with portals of hellfire if you don't wanna turn into...whatever you are, exactly.

cards.title: Combat Pragmatism
cards.body: When a non-hero card enters play, you may destroy this card. If you do, you may use a power now.

flavorQuotes.text: Should have kept your eyes on me.

cards.title: Forbidden Archives
body: Each player may draw 2 cards now.
For each other player that draws cards this way, {Titan} deals himself 2 psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: Not everything can be true. Hopefully.
cards.flavorReference: Inscription from the Ministry of Strategic Science Archive

cards.title: Hapless Shield
cards.body: Select a non-hero target. Each other non-hero target deals that target 1 melee damage.

cards.title: Immolate
body: Play this card next to a target.
The first time that target deals damage each turn, it deals itself 1 fire damage.
If that target leaves play, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Some things donâ€™t react{BR}well to being set on fire.

cards.title: Juggernaut Strike
body: If Titanform is in your hand you may play it now.
{Titan} deals 1 target 4 infernal damage and each other target from that deck 1 projectile damage.

flavorQuotes.text: This is not the part we call being sneaky.

cards.title: Misbehavior
body: Reveal up to 3 cards from the top of your deck. Put 1 of them into play or into your hand. Put the rest into your trash.
{Titan} regains X HP, where X is 3 minus the number of cards revealed this way.

flavorQuotes.text: I'm due for a bad idea any minute now.

cards.title: Molten Veins
body: {Titan} regains 2 HP.
You may search your deck and trash for a copy of the card Titanform and put it into your hand. If you searched your deck, shuffle it.
You may play a card.
cards.flavorText: The obsidian shard embedded in{BR}Titan's forearm began to gleam. Then it{BR}began to spread.

cards.title: MS.5 Demolition Charge
body: Destroy all environment cards.
For each environment card destroyed this way, {Titan} deals himself 1 fire damage.

cards.title: Obsidian Grasp
body: {Titan} deals 1 target 3 melee damage.
If Titanform is in play, you may discard a card to search your deck and trash for a copy of the card Immolate and play it next to that target. If you searched your deck, shuffle it.

flavorQuotes.text: I call it the right hand of doom.

cards.title: Payback Time
body: Increase damage dealt by {Titan} by 1 to non-hero targets that have dealt him damage since the end of his last turn.
At the end of your turn {Titan} regains 1 HP.
cards.flavorReference: Agent Nelson, Fall of Titan One-shot

cards.title: Reversal
body: {Titan} deals 1 target 1 infernal damage.
Redirect the next damage dealt by that target back to itself.
If Titanform is in your trash, you may put it into play or into your hand.

flavorQuotes.text: Watch it. We're not all indestructible.

cards.title: Stubborn Goliath
powers: {Titan} deals up to 2 non-hero targets 2 infernal damage each.{BR}Until the start of your next turn, when those targets would deal damage, you may redirect that damage to {Titan}.

flavorQuotes.text: He likes it that way.{BR}The whole 'lone hero' thing.

cards.title: The Chaplain
powers: If Titanform is in play, destroy 1 ongoing card.

flavorQuotes.text: I might not be a good shot, but the Chaplain here fires very large bullets.

cards.title: Titanform
body: Whenever {Titan} is dealt damage by another target, reduce damage dealt to {Titan} by 1 until the start of your next turn.
When {Titan} would deal damage, you may destroy this card to increase that damage by 2.

flavorQuotes.text: Why don't you pick on{BR}someone your own density?

cards.title: Unbreakable
body: Skip any effects which would act at the end of the villain turn.
You may not use Powers. You may not draw cards.
At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

cards.title: Vulcan's Judgment
cards.body: When this card is destroyed, {Titan} deals 1 villain target 5 infernal damage. If Titanform is in play, {Titan} also deals that target 2 fire damage.

promoCards.title: Titan
powers: You may play an ongoing card. Draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: Each hero may deal themselves 1 psychic damage to draw a card.
Prevent the next damage that would be dealt to a hero target.

openingLines.default: The Ministry will be a lot happier when you're locked up in the Vault.
openingLines.Cauldron.MythosCharacter: Well, it almost worked before. This time, I'll make sure you don't come back.

promoCards.title: Titan
powers: If Titanform is in play, 1 target deals {Titan} 1 melee damage. Otherwise, play the top card of your deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card now,

openingLines.default: Stop! This is Neo-Windmill City Law Enforcement!

promoCards.title: Titan
powers: Titan regains 1 HP. Search your deck, trash, and hand for Titanform and play it. Shuffle your deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card now,
One Hero may use a power now.
One hero may discard a card to reduce damage dealt to them by 1 until the start of your turn.

openingLines.default: How do you like my costume?
openingLines.Cauldron.MythosCharacter: I wish you'd find your old demeanor and put it back on. You're not much to look at, mate.
